name: Cursed Touch
description: Innate: Amumu's basic attacks and  Curse of the Sad Mummy apply a Curse for 3 seconds, refreshing with each subsequent basic attack.
descriptions: Innate: Amumu's basic attacks and  Curse of the Sad Mummy apply a Curse for 3 seconds, refreshing with each subsequent basic attack.
Cursed targets receive  10% bonus true damage from all incoming pre-mitigation magic damage.

name: Bandage Toss
description: Active: Amumu tosses a bandage in the target direction that  stuns the first enemy it hits for 1 second, dealing magic damage and  pulling him to them.
descriptions: Active: Amumu tosses a bandage in the target direction that  stuns the first enemy it hits for 1 second, dealing magic damage and  pulling him to them.
Amumu follows his target for up to 2000 units from the cast position.

name: Despair
description: Toggle: Amumu cries a continuous pool of tears, refreshing Curse and dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies.
leveling: Magic Damage Per Half Second:5 / 7.5 / 10 / 12.5 / 15 (+ 0.5 / 0.625 / 0.75 / 0.875 / 1% (+ 0.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)
levelings: Magic Damage Per Half Second:5 / 7.5 / 10 / 12.5 / 15 (+ 0.5 / 0.625 / 0.75 / 0.875 / 1% (+ 0.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)
descriptions: Toggle: Amumu cries a continuous pool of tears, refreshing Curse and dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies.

name: Tantrum
description: Passive: Amumu takes reduced post-mitigation damage from each instance of physical damage.
leveling: Physical Damage Reduction:2 / 4 / 6 / 8 / 10 (+ 3% bonus armor) (+ 3% bonus magic resistance)
levelings: Physical Damage Reduction:2 / 4 / 6 / 8 / 10 (+ 3% bonus armor) (+ 3% bonus magic resistance)
descriptions: Passive: Amumu takes reduced post-mitigation damage from each instance of physical damage.
Active: Amumu releases his anger, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.
Tantrum's  cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds every time Amumu is hit by a basic attack.

name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
description: Active: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages,  knocking them down,  rooting and  disarming them for 2 seconds, while also dealing magic damage and applying his Curse.
descriptions: Active: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages,  knocking them down,  rooting and  disarming them for 2 seconds, while also dealing magic damage and applying his Curse.
